# @3df-spa/ui + @3df-spa/charts â€” LLM Reference

> Complete API reference for AI assistants helping consumers use these packages.
> This file is NOT published. It is a local reference for LLMs.

## Overview

`@3df-spa/ui` is a private Vue 3 component library with 199 components.
`@3df-spa/charts` is a companion SVG chart library with 6 chart types (zero dependencies).

Both packages are published privately to GitHub Packages under the `@3df` scope.
All imports come from `@3df-spa/ui` or `@3df-spa/charts` â€” never from internal paths.

### Design Philosophy: Borderless

All components use a **borderless** approach â€” no visible `border`, `ring`, or `outline` on component edges. Visual separation is achieved through:

- **Elevated backgrounds**: `bg-card` / `bg-popover` are slightly lighter than `bg-background` in dark mode (5% vs 0%)
- **Translucent fills**: form controls use `bg-foreground/5` â€” adapts automatically to light/dark
- **Shadows**: `shadow-sm`, `shadow-md`, `shadow-lg` for floating elements

This eliminates anti-aliasing artifacts (corner darkening, chromatic fringing) that occur with CSS `border`, `box-shadow` (ring), and `outline` on rounded elements.

---

## Setup (Consumer Project)

### 1. Configure `.npmrc`

```ini
@3df:registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com
//npm.pkg.github.com/:_authToken=${GITHUB_TOKEN}
```

### 2. Install

```bash
# UI components
pnpm add @3df-spa/ui class-variance-authority clsx tailwind-merge

# Charts (optional)
pnpm add @3df-spa/charts

# Required peer dependencies (if using Calendar/DatePicker)
pnpm add date-fns

# Required peer dependency (if using Carousel)
pnpm add embla-carousel
```

### 3. CSS Setup

There are **two options** for setting up CSS. Choose one:

**Option A â€” Pre-compiled CSS (simplest, recommended for most projects):**

```css
@import '@3df-spa/ui/styles.css';
```

This single import includes all Tailwind utilities, theme tokens, and component animations. No additional Tailwind configuration needed.

> **`tailwindcss` is NOT required** with this option. Everything is pre-compiled.
>
> **Note:** If your project also uses Tailwind CSS for your own styles, use Option B to avoid duplicating Tailwind's base styles.

**Option B â€” Integration with your own Tailwind CSS v4:**

Requires `tailwindcss` v4 installed in the consumer project:

```bash
pnpm add -D tailwindcss @tailwindcss/vite
```

```css
@import 'tailwindcss';
@import '@3df-spa/ui/theme.css';
```

> **No `@source` directive needed!** The `theme.css` file already includes `@source "../../dist"` internally, which Tailwind resolves relative to the imported CSS file â€” automatically pointing to `node_modules/@3df-spa/ui/dist/`.

### 4. Import & Use

```vue
<script setup lang="ts">
import { Button, Badge, Input } from '@3df-spa/ui';
</script>

<template>
  <Button variant="outline" size="sm">Click me</Button>
  <Badge variant="success">Online</Badge>
  <Input v-model="email" placeholder="Email" />
</template>
```

### 5. Update Packages

```bash
pnpm update @3df-spa/ui @3df-spa/charts
```

### 6. Tailwind Requirement Summary

| Scenario | Need `tailwindcss`? |
|---|---|
| Option A (pre-compiled CSS) | **No** â€” all CSS is pre-built |
| Option B (Tailwind integration) | **Yes** â€” `tailwindcss` v4 + `@tailwindcss/vite` or `@tailwindcss/postcss` |
| Customizing theme tokens | **Yes** â€” requires Option B with `@theme` overrides |
| Using `@3df-spa/charts` only | **No** â€” charts are pure SVG, no CSS framework needed |

### 7. Tree-shaking & Performance

- Build uses `preserveModules: true` â€” each component is a separate ES module (~2 KB avg)
- Only imported components are included in the consumer's bundle
- All heavy deps (`vue`, `cva`, `clsx`, `tailwind-merge`, `date-fns`, `embla-carousel`) are externalized
- `@3df-spa/charts` has zero deps (only `vue` peer) â€” pure SVG, ~88 KB total
- Standard barrel import works perfectly with Vite (tree-shaking is automatic)
- Direct imports also available: `import Button from '@3df-spa/ui/dist/components/ui/buttons/UiButton.vue.js'`

---

## Utility: `cn()`

```ts
import { cn } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

Combines `clsx` + `tailwind-merge`. Use it to conditionally merge Tailwind classes:

```ts
cn('px-4 py-2', isActive && 'bg-primary', className)
```

---

## Dark Mode

Add/remove the `.dark` class on `<html>` or any ancestor:

```ts
document.documentElement.classList.toggle('dark');
```

All components adapt automatically.

---

# COMPONENT REFERENCE

## Button

```ts
import { Button, buttonVariants } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `variant` | `'default' \| 'secondary' \| 'outline' \| 'ghost' \| 'destructive' \| 'link'` | `'default'` |
| `size` | `'default' \| 'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'lg' \| 'icon'` | `'default'` |
| `as` | `string \| Component` | `'button'` |

### Examples

```vue
<Button>Default</Button>
<Button variant="destructive" size="sm">Delete</Button>
<Button variant="outline" size="icon"><TrashIcon /></Button>
<Button as="a" href="/home" variant="link">Go home</Button>

<!-- Use buttonVariants() without the component -->
<a :class="buttonVariants({ variant: 'link' })">Link styled</a>
```

---

## Badge

```ts
import { Badge, badgeVariants } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `variant` | `'default' \| 'secondary' \| 'outline' \| 'destructive' \| 'success' \| 'warning' \| 'red' \| 'orange' \| 'yellow' \| 'green' \| 'teal' \| 'blue' \| 'indigo' \| 'purple' \| 'pink' \| 'gray'` | `'default'` |
| `size` | `'default' \| 'sm' \| 'lg'` | `'default'` |
| `as` | `string \| Component` | `'span'` |

### Examples

```vue
<Badge>Default</Badge>
<Badge variant="success">Active</Badge>
<Badge variant="destructive" size="sm">Error</Badge>
<Badge variant="blue" class="rounded-full">Pill</Badge>

<!-- Use badgeVariants() without the component -->
<span :class="badgeVariants({ variant: 'outline' })">Tag</span>
```

---

## Alert

```ts
import { Alert, AlertTitle, AlertDescription, alertVariants } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (Alert)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `variant` | `'default' \| 'destructive' \| 'success' \| 'warning' \| 'info'` | `'default'` |

### Example

```vue
<Alert variant="success">
  <CheckIcon />
  <AlertTitle>Success</AlertTitle>
  <AlertDescription>Your changes have been saved.</AlertDescription>
</Alert>
```

---

## Label

```ts
import { Label } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

Simple `<label>` wrapper. Pass `for` attribute normally.

```vue
<Label for="email">Email</Label>
```

---

## Input

```ts
import { Input, inputVariants } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `size` | `'default' \| 'sm' \| 'lg'` | `'default'` |
| `modelValue` | `string \| number` | â€” |

### Example

```vue
<Input v-model="name" placeholder="Your name" />
<Input size="sm" type="email" />
<Input aria-invalid="true" /> <!-- Shows destructive ring (validation only) -->
```

---

## Textarea

```ts
import { Textarea } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `modelValue` | `string` | â€” |

```vue
<Textarea v-model="message" placeholder="Write something..." rows="4" />
```

---

## Select

```ts
import { Select, SelectItem } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (Select)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `modelValue` | `string` | `''` |
| `placeholder` | `string` | `'Select an option'` |
| `disabled` | `boolean` | `false` |

### Example

```vue
<Select v-model="country" placeholder="Choose country">
  <SelectItem value="mx">Mexico</SelectItem>
  <SelectItem value="co">Colombia</SelectItem>
  <SelectItem value="ar" disabled>Argentina</SelectItem>
</Select>
```

---

## Checkbox

```ts
import { Checkbox } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `modelValue` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `indeterminate` | `boolean` | `false` |

```vue
<Checkbox v-model="agreed" />
```

---

## Radio

```ts
import { Radio } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<Radio v-model="plan" value="free" name="plan">Free</Radio>
<Radio v-model="plan" value="pro" name="plan">Pro</Radio>
```

---

## Switch

```ts
import { Switch } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `modelValue` | `boolean` | `false` |

```vue
<Switch v-model="notifications" />
```

---

## Slider

```ts
import { Slider } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `modelValue` | `number` | `0` |
| `min` | `number` | `0` |
| `max` | `number` | `100` |
| `step` | `number` | `1` |
| `disabled` | `boolean` | `false` |

```vue
<Slider v-model="volume" :min="0" :max="100" :step="5" />
```

---

## Toggle

```ts
import { Toggle, toggleVariants } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `variant` | `'default' \| 'outline'` | `'default'` |
| `size` | `'default' \| 'sm' \| 'lg'` | `'default'` |
| `pressed` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled` | `boolean` | `false` |

```vue
<Toggle v-model:pressed="isBold" variant="outline" size="sm">
  <BoldIcon />
</Toggle>
```

---

## Card

```ts
import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, CardFooter } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Example

```vue
<Card>
  <CardHeader>
    <CardTitle>Account</CardTitle>
    <CardDescription>Manage your account settings.</CardDescription>
  </CardHeader>
  <CardContent>
    <!-- form fields -->
  </CardContent>
  <CardFooter>
    <Button>Save</Button>
  </CardFooter>
</Card>
```

---

## Dialog

```ts
import { Dialog, DialogTrigger, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogFooter, DialogTitle, DialogDescription, DialogClose } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (Dialog)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `open` | `boolean` | `undefined` (uncontrolled) |
| `defaultOpen` | `boolean` | `false` |

### Example

```vue
<Dialog>
  <DialogTrigger as-child>
    <Button>Open Dialog</Button>
  </DialogTrigger>
  <DialogContent>
    <DialogHeader>
      <DialogTitle>Edit Profile</DialogTitle>
      <DialogDescription>Make changes to your profile.</DialogDescription>
    </DialogHeader>
    <!-- content -->
    <DialogFooter>
      <DialogClose as-child>
        <Button variant="outline">Cancel</Button>
      </DialogClose>
      <Button>Save</Button>
    </DialogFooter>
  </DialogContent>
</Dialog>

<!-- Controlled -->
<Dialog v-model:open="isOpen">...</Dialog>
```

---

## Alert Dialog

```ts
import { AlertDialog, AlertDialogTrigger, AlertDialogContent, AlertDialogHeader, AlertDialogFooter, AlertDialogTitle, AlertDialogDescription, AlertDialogAction, AlertDialogCancel } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<AlertDialog>
  <AlertDialogTrigger as-child>
    <Button variant="destructive">Delete</Button>
  </AlertDialogTrigger>
  <AlertDialogContent>
    <AlertDialogHeader>
      <AlertDialogTitle>Are you sure?</AlertDialogTitle>
      <AlertDialogDescription>This action cannot be undone.</AlertDialogDescription>
    </AlertDialogHeader>
    <AlertDialogFooter>
      <AlertDialogCancel>Cancel</AlertDialogCancel>
      <AlertDialogAction @click="handleDelete">Delete</AlertDialogAction>
    </AlertDialogFooter>
  </AlertDialogContent>
</AlertDialog>
```

---

## Sheet (Side Panel)

```ts
import { Sheet, SheetTrigger, SheetContent, SheetHeader, SheetFooter, SheetTitle, SheetDescription, SheetClose } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (SheetContent)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `side` | `'top' \| 'bottom' \| 'left' \| 'right'` | `'right'` |

```vue
<Sheet>
  <SheetTrigger as-child>
    <Button variant="outline">Open</Button>
  </SheetTrigger>
  <SheetContent side="right">
    <SheetHeader>
      <SheetTitle>Settings</SheetTitle>
      <SheetDescription>Configure your preferences.</SheetDescription>
    </SheetHeader>
    <!-- content -->
  </SheetContent>
</Sheet>
```

---

## Drawer (Bottom Sheet)

```ts
import { Drawer, DrawerTrigger, DrawerContent, DrawerHeader, DrawerFooter, DrawerTitle, DrawerDescription } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<Drawer>
  <DrawerTrigger as-child>
    <Button>Open Drawer</Button>
  </DrawerTrigger>
  <DrawerContent>
    <DrawerHeader>
      <DrawerTitle>Confirm</DrawerTitle>
    </DrawerHeader>
    <p>Drawer body</p>
    <DrawerFooter>
      <Button>Submit</Button>
    </DrawerFooter>
  </DrawerContent>
</Drawer>
```

---

## Dropdown Menu

```ts
import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuTrigger, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuSeparator, DropdownMenuLabel, DropdownMenuShortcut } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<DropdownMenu>
  <DropdownMenuTrigger as-child>
    <Button variant="ghost" size="icon"><MoreIcon /></Button>
  </DropdownMenuTrigger>
  <DropdownMenuContent>
    <DropdownMenuLabel>Actions</DropdownMenuLabel>
    <DropdownMenuSeparator />
    <DropdownMenuItem @select="handleEdit">
      Edit
      <DropdownMenuShortcut>âŒ˜E</DropdownMenuShortcut>
    </DropdownMenuItem>
    <DropdownMenuItem @select="handleDelete" class="text-destructive">
      Delete
    </DropdownMenuItem>
  </DropdownMenuContent>
</DropdownMenu>
```

---

## Context Menu

```ts
import { ContextMenu, ContextMenuTrigger, ContextMenuContent, ContextMenuItem, ContextMenuSeparator, ContextMenuLabel, ContextMenuShortcut, ContextMenuCheckboxItem, ContextMenuRadioGroup, ContextMenuRadioItem, ContextMenuSub, ContextMenuSubTrigger, ContextMenuSubContent } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<ContextMenu>
  <ContextMenuTrigger>
    <div class="h-40 w-full border border-dashed rounded-md flex items-center justify-center">
      Right-click here
    </div>
  </ContextMenuTrigger>
  <ContextMenuContent>
    <ContextMenuItem @select="handleCopy">Copy</ContextMenuItem>
    <ContextMenuItem @select="handlePaste">Paste</ContextMenuItem>
    <ContextMenuSeparator />
    <ContextMenuSub>
      <ContextMenuSubTrigger>More</ContextMenuSubTrigger>
      <ContextMenuSubContent>
        <ContextMenuItem>Option A</ContextMenuItem>
        <ContextMenuItem>Option B</ContextMenuItem>
      </ContextMenuSubContent>
    </ContextMenuSub>
  </ContextMenuContent>
</ContextMenu>
```

---

## Menubar

```ts
import { Menubar, MenubarMenu, MenubarTrigger, MenubarContent, MenubarItem, MenubarSeparator, MenubarLabel, MenubarShortcut, MenubarCheckboxItem, MenubarRadioGroup, MenubarRadioItem, MenubarSub, MenubarSubTrigger, MenubarSubContent } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<Menubar>
  <MenubarMenu>
    <MenubarTrigger>File</MenubarTrigger>
    <MenubarContent>
      <MenubarItem>New <MenubarShortcut>âŒ˜N</MenubarShortcut></MenubarItem>
      <MenubarItem>Open <MenubarShortcut>âŒ˜O</MenubarShortcut></MenubarItem>
      <MenubarSeparator />
      <MenubarItem>Exit</MenubarItem>
    </MenubarContent>
  </MenubarMenu>
  <MenubarMenu>
    <MenubarTrigger>Edit</MenubarTrigger>
    <MenubarContent>
      <MenubarItem>Undo</MenubarItem>
      <MenubarItem>Redo</MenubarItem>
    </MenubarContent>
  </MenubarMenu>
</Menubar>
```

---

## Popover

```ts
import { Popover, PopoverTrigger, PopoverContent } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<Popover>
  <PopoverTrigger as-child>
    <Button variant="outline">Open Popover</Button>
  </PopoverTrigger>
  <PopoverContent>
    <p>Popover content here</p>
  </PopoverContent>
</Popover>
```

---

## Tooltip

```ts
import { Tooltip, TooltipTrigger, TooltipContent } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (Tooltip)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `delay` | `number` | `300` |
| `closeDelay` | `number` | `150` |

```vue
<Tooltip>
  <TooltipTrigger as-child>
    <Button variant="ghost" size="icon"><InfoIcon /></Button>
  </TooltipTrigger>
  <TooltipContent>Helpful tooltip text</TooltipContent>
</Tooltip>
```

---

## Hover Card

```ts
import { HoverCard, HoverCardTrigger, HoverCardContent } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (HoverCard)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `openDelay` | `number` | `700` |
| `closeDelay` | `number` | `300` |

```vue
<HoverCard>
  <HoverCardTrigger as-child>
    <a href="#">@user</a>
  </HoverCardTrigger>
  <HoverCardContent>
    <p>User profile card content</p>
  </HoverCardContent>
</HoverCard>
```

---

## Toast / Sonner

```ts
import { Toaster, toast } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### API

```ts
toast('Simple message');
toast.success('Saved!');
toast.error('Something failed');
toast.warning('Be careful');
toast.info('FYI');

toast({
  title: 'Scheduled',
  description: 'Meeting at 3pm',
  duration: 5000,
  action: { label: 'Undo', onClick: () => handleUndo() },
});

toast.dismiss(id);
toast.dismissAll();
```

### Setup â€” Add `<Toaster />` once at the app root

```vue
<!-- App.vue -->
<template>
  <RouterView />
  <Toaster position="bottom-right" />
</template>
```

### Toaster Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `position` | `'top-left' \| 'top-center' \| 'top-right' \| 'bottom-left' \| 'bottom-center' \| 'bottom-right'` | `'bottom-right'` |
| `maxToasts` | `number` | `5` |

---

## Accordion

```ts
import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger, AccordionContent } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (Accordion)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `type` | `'single' \| 'multiple'` | `'single'` |
| `modelValue` | `string \| string[]` | â€” |
| `defaultValue` | `string \| string[]` | â€” |
| `collapsible` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled` | `boolean` | `false` |

### Example

```vue
<Accordion type="single" collapsible>
  <AccordionItem value="item-1">
    <AccordionTrigger>Is it accessible?</AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>Yes. It follows WAI-ARIA guidelines.</AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
  <AccordionItem value="item-2">
    <AccordionTrigger>Is it styled?</AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>Yes, with Tailwind CSS.</AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>

<!-- Multiple open -->
<Accordion type="multiple" v-model="openItems">...</Accordion>
```

---

## Collapsible

```ts
import { Collapsible, CollapsibleTrigger, CollapsibleContent } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `open` | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `defaultOpen` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled` | `boolean` | `false` |

```vue
<Collapsible>
  <CollapsibleTrigger as-child>
    <Button variant="ghost">Toggle</Button>
  </CollapsibleTrigger>
  <CollapsibleContent>
    <p>Hidden content</p>
  </CollapsibleContent>
</Collapsible>
```

---

## Table

```ts
import { Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableFooter, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell, TableCaption, TableEmpty } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<Table>
  <TableCaption>A list of users</TableCaption>
  <TableHeader>
    <TableRow>
      <TableHead>Name</TableHead>
      <TableHead>Email</TableHead>
      <TableHead class="text-right">Amount</TableHead>
    </TableRow>
  </TableHeader>
  <TableBody>
    <TableRow v-for="user in users" :key="user.id">
      <TableCell class="font-medium">{{ user.name }}</TableCell>
      <TableCell>{{ user.email }}</TableCell>
      <TableCell class="text-right">{{ user.amount }}</TableCell>
    </TableRow>
    <TableEmpty v-if="!users.length" :colspan="3">No users found.</TableEmpty>
  </TableBody>
</Table>
```

---

## Pagination

```ts
import { Pagination, PaginationContent, PaginationItem, PaginationLink, PaginationPrevious, PaginationNext, PaginationEllipsis } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<Pagination>
  <PaginationContent>
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationPrevious @click="page--" :disabled="page === 1" />
    </PaginationItem>
    <PaginationItem v-for="p in pages" :key="p">
      <PaginationLink :is-active="p === page" @click="page = p">{{ p }}</PaginationLink>
    </PaginationItem>
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationNext @click="page++" :disabled="page === totalPages" />
    </PaginationItem>
  </PaginationContent>
</Pagination>
```

---

## Progress

```ts
import { Progress } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `modelValue` | `number \| undefined` | `undefined` (indeterminate) |
| `max` | `number` | `100` |

```vue
<Progress :model-value="75" />
<Progress /> <!-- indeterminate / pulsing -->
```

---

## Skeleton

```ts
import { Skeleton } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<Skeleton class="h-4 w-[200px]" />
<Skeleton class="h-12 w-12 rounded-full" />
```

## Separator

```ts
import { Separator } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `orientation` | `'horizontal' \| 'vertical'` | `'horizontal'` |

```vue
<Separator />
<Separator orientation="vertical" class="h-6" />
```

---

## Scroll Area

```ts
import { ScrollArea } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `type` | `'auto' \| 'always' \| 'scroll' \| 'hover'` | `'hover'` |
| `orientation` | `'vertical' \| 'horizontal' \| 'both'` | `'vertical'` |

```vue
<ScrollArea class="h-72 w-48">
  <div v-for="i in 50" :key="i" class="py-2">Item {{ i }}</div>
</ScrollArea>
```

---

## Avatar

```ts
import { Avatar, AvatarImage, AvatarFallback } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (Avatar)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `size` | `'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' \| 'xl'` | `'md'` |

```vue
<Avatar size="lg">
  <AvatarImage src="/avatar.jpg" alt="User" />
  <AvatarFallback>JD</AvatarFallback>
</Avatar>
```

---

## Breadcrumb

```ts
import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbList, BreadcrumbItem, BreadcrumbLink, BreadcrumbPage, BreadcrumbSeparator, BreadcrumbEllipsis } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<Breadcrumb>
  <BreadcrumbList>
    <BreadcrumbItem>
      <BreadcrumbLink href="/">Home</BreadcrumbLink>
    </BreadcrumbItem>
    <BreadcrumbSeparator />
    <BreadcrumbItem>
      <BreadcrumbLink href="/settings">Settings</BreadcrumbLink>
    </BreadcrumbItem>
    <BreadcrumbSeparator />
    <BreadcrumbItem>
      <BreadcrumbPage>Profile</BreadcrumbPage>
    </BreadcrumbItem>
  </BreadcrumbList>
</Breadcrumb>
```

---

## Calendar

```ts
import { Calendar } from '@3df-spa/ui';
import type { DateRange } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `mode` | `'single' \| 'range'` | `'single'` |
| `modelValue` | `Date \| DateRange` | â€” |
| `numberOfMonths` | `number` | `1` |
| `weekStartsOn` | `0-6` | `1` (Monday) |
| `showOutsideDays` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `fixedWeeks` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `disabled` | `(date: Date) => boolean` | â€” |
| `locale` | `Locale` (date-fns) | â€” |

```vue
<Calendar v-model="selectedDate" />
<Calendar mode="range" v-model="dateRange" :number-of-months="2" />
```

---

## DatePicker

```ts
import { DatePicker, DateRangePicker } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (DatePicker)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `modelValue` | `Date` | â€” |
| `placeholder` | `string` | `'Pick a date'` |
| `formatStr` | `string` | `'PPP'` |
| `disabled` | `(date: Date) => boolean` | â€” |
| `locale` | `Locale` (date-fns) | â€” |

```vue
<DatePicker v-model="date" placeholder="Select date" />
<DateRangePicker v-model="range" />
```

---

## Combobox

```ts
import { Combobox } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `modelValue` | `string` | `''` |
| `options` | `{ value: string; label: string; disabled?: boolean }[]` | *required* |
| `placeholder` | `string` | `'Select option...'` |
| `searchPlaceholder` | `string` | `'Search...'` |
| `emptyMessage` | `string` | `'No results found.'` |

```vue
<Combobox
  v-model="framework"
  :options="[
    { value: 'vue', label: 'Vue' },
    { value: 'react', label: 'React' },
    { value: 'svelte', label: 'Svelte' },
  ]"
  placeholder="Choose framework..."
/>
```

---

## Command (âŒ˜K Palette)

```ts
import { Command, CommandDialog, CommandInput, CommandList, CommandEmpty, CommandGroup, CommandItem, CommandShortcut, CommandSeparator } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<CommandDialog v-model:open="isOpen">
  <CommandInput placeholder="Type a command..." />
  <CommandList>
    <CommandEmpty>No results found.</CommandEmpty>
    <CommandGroup heading="Suggestions">
      <CommandItem @select="handleCalendar">Calendar</CommandItem>
      <CommandItem @select="handleSearch">Search</CommandItem>
    </CommandGroup>
    <CommandSeparator />
    <CommandGroup heading="Settings">
      <CommandItem @select="handleProfile">
        Profile
        <CommandShortcut>âŒ˜P</CommandShortcut>
      </CommandItem>
    </CommandGroup>
  </CommandList>
</CommandDialog>
```

---

## Input OTP

```ts
import { InputOTP, InputOTPGroup, InputOTPSlot, InputOTPSeparator } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (InputOTP)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `modelValue` | `string` | `''` |
| `length` | `number` | `6` |
| `pattern` | `'numeric' \| 'alphanumeric' \| 'alpha' \| RegExp` | `'numeric'` |
| `autoSubmit` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled` | `boolean` | `false` |

```vue
<InputOTP v-model="code" :length="6" @complete="verify">
  <InputOTPGroup>
    <InputOTPSlot v-for="i in 3" :key="i" :index="i - 1" />
  </InputOTPGroup>
  <InputOTPSeparator />
  <InputOTPGroup>
    <InputOTPSlot v-for="i in 3" :key="i + 3" :index="i + 2" />
  </InputOTPGroup>
</InputOTP>
```

---

## Carousel

```ts
import { Carousel, CarouselContent, CarouselItem, CarouselPrevious, CarouselNext } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (Carousel)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `orientation` | `'horizontal' \| 'vertical'` | `'horizontal'` |
| `opts` | `Partial<EmblaOptionsType>` | â€” |

```vue
<Carousel :opts="{ loop: true }">
  <CarouselContent>
    <CarouselItem v-for="i in 5" :key="i" class="basis-1/3">
      <Card>{{ i }}</Card>
    </CarouselItem>
  </CarouselContent>
  <CarouselPrevious />
  <CarouselNext />
</Carousel>
```

---

## Navigation Menu

```ts
import { NavigationMenu, NavigationMenuList, NavigationMenuItem, NavigationMenuTrigger, NavigationMenuContent, NavigationMenuLink, NavigationMenuViewport } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

```vue
<NavigationMenu>
  <NavigationMenuList>
    <NavigationMenuItem>
      <NavigationMenuTrigger>Getting Started</NavigationMenuTrigger>
      <NavigationMenuContent>
        <ul class="grid gap-3 p-4 w-[400px]">
          <li><NavigationMenuLink href="/docs">Documentation</NavigationMenuLink></li>
        </ul>
      </NavigationMenuContent>
    </NavigationMenuItem>
    <NavigationMenuItem>
      <NavigationMenuLink href="/about">About</NavigationMenuLink>
    </NavigationMenuItem>
  </NavigationMenuList>
  <NavigationMenuViewport />
</NavigationMenu>
```

---

## Sidebar

```ts
import { SidebarProvider, Sidebar, SidebarTrigger, SidebarHeader, SidebarContent, SidebarFooter, SidebarGroup, SidebarGroupLabel, SidebarGroupContent, SidebarMenu, SidebarMenuItem, SidebarMenuButton, SidebarMenuSub, SidebarMenuSubItem, SidebarMenuSubButton, SidebarMenuBadge, SidebarMenuAction, SidebarMenuSkeleton, SidebarSeparator, SidebarRail, SidebarInset, useSidebar } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (Sidebar)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `side` | `'left' \| 'right'` | `'left'` |
| `variant` | `'sidebar' \| 'floating' \| 'inset'` | `'sidebar'` |
| `collapsible` | `'offcanvas' \| 'icon' \| 'none'` | `'offcanvas'` |

### Example

```vue
<SidebarProvider>
  <Sidebar>
    <SidebarHeader>
      <h2>My App</h2>
    </SidebarHeader>
    <SidebarContent>
      <SidebarGroup>
        <SidebarGroupLabel>Main</SidebarGroupLabel>
        <SidebarGroupContent>
          <SidebarMenu>
            <SidebarMenuItem>
              <SidebarMenuButton is-active>
                <HomeIcon />
                Dashboard
              </SidebarMenuButton>
            </SidebarMenuItem>
            <SidebarMenuItem>
              <SidebarMenuButton>
                <SettingsIcon />
                Settings
                <SidebarMenuBadge>3</SidebarMenuBadge>
              </SidebarMenuButton>
            </SidebarMenuItem>
          </SidebarMenu>
        </SidebarGroupContent>
      </SidebarGroup>
    </SidebarContent>
    <SidebarRail />
  </Sidebar>
  <SidebarInset>
    <header>
      <SidebarTrigger />
    </header>
    <main>
      <RouterView />
    </main>
  </SidebarInset>
</SidebarProvider>
```

### Composable

```ts
const { state, open, isMobile, toggleSidebar } = useSidebar();
```

---

## Kbd

```ts
import { Kbd } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `size` | `'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'default' \| 'lg'` | `'default'` |

```vue
<Kbd>âŒ˜</Kbd><Kbd>K</Kbd>
<Kbd size="sm">Ctrl</Kbd>
```

---

## Item

```ts
import { Item, ItemLabel, ItemDescription, itemVariants } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props (Item)

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `variant` | `'default' \| 'ghost' \| 'muted' \| 'destructive'` | `'default'` |
| `size` | `'sm' \| 'default' \| 'lg'` | `'default'` |

```vue
<Item variant="default" as="button" @click="handleClick">
  <UserIcon />
  <div>
    <ItemLabel>John Doe</ItemLabel>
    <ItemDescription>john@example.com</ItemDescription>
  </div>
</Item>
```

---

## Empty State

```ts
import { EmptyState } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `title` | `string` | â€” |
| `description` | `string` | â€” |

```vue
<EmptyState title="No results" description="Try a different search term.">
  <template #icon><SearchIcon /></template>
  <Button variant="outline" size="sm">Clear filters</Button>
</EmptyState>
```

---

## Logo Cloud

```ts
import { LogoCloud } from '@3df-spa/ui';
import type { LogoItem } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `logos` | `LogoItem[]` | *required* |
| `columns` | `3 \| 4 \| 5 \| 6` | `4` |
| `showNames` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `logoHeight` | `number` | `40` |
| `grayscale` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `heading` | `string` | â€” |

```ts
// LogoItem = { name: string; src: string; href?: string; alt?: string }
```

```vue
<LogoCloud
  heading="Trusted by"
  :logos="[
    { name: 'Acme', src: '/logos/acme.svg' },
    { name: 'Corp', src: '/logos/corp.svg', href: 'https://corp.com' },
  ]"
  :columns="4"
  grayscale
/>
```

---

## Logo Marquee

```ts
import { LogoMarquee } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `logos` | `LogoItem[]` | *required* |
| `direction` | `'left' \| 'right'` | `'left'` |
| `duration` | `number` (seconds) | `30` |
| `hoverDuration` | `number` | `80` |
| `logoHeight` | `number` | `40` |
| `gap` | `number` (px) | `48` |
| `grayscale` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `fadeMask` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `pauseOnHover` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `showNames` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `heading` | `string` | â€” |
| `reverse` | `boolean` | `false` (two-row opposite) |

```vue
<LogoMarquee :logos="logos" heading="Our partners" :duration="25" />
```

---

## Hero Sections

```ts
import { HeroSimple, HeroSplit, HeroImage, HeroGradient, HeroCentered, HeroMinimal, HeroVideo } from '@3df-spa/ui';
import type { HeroAction, HeroAlign } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### HeroAction type

```ts
interface HeroAction {
  label: string;
  href?: string;
  external?: boolean;
  variant?: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'outline' | 'ghost';
}
```

### HeroSimple

```vue
<HeroSimple
  headline="Build faster"
  description="A modern component library."
  :actions="[
    { label: 'Get Started', variant: 'primary' },
    { label: 'Learn More', variant: 'outline' },
  ]"
  align="center"
  @action="handleAction"
/>
```

### HeroSplit

```vue
<HeroSplit
  headline="Ship with confidence"
  description="Production-ready components."
  image-src="/hero.jpg"
  image-alt="Hero image"
  :reverse="false"
  :actions="[{ label: 'Start', variant: 'primary' }]"
/>
```

### HeroGradient

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `gradient` | `'purple' \| 'blue' \| 'green' \| 'orange' \| 'rose' \| 'custom'` | `'purple'` |
| `customGradient` | `string` (CSS) | â€” |
| `blobs` | `boolean` | `true` |

```vue
<HeroGradient
  headline="Beautiful gradients"
  gradient="blue"
  :blobs="true"
  :actions="[{ label: 'Explore', variant: 'secondary' }]"
/>
```

---

## Banner

```ts
import { Banner, bannerVariants } from '@3df-spa/ui';
```

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|--------|
| `variant` | `'default' \| 'info' \| 'success' \| 'warning' \| 'destructive' \| 'muted'` | `'default'` |
| `position` | `'static' \| 'sticky' \| 'fixed'` | `'static'` |
| `align` | `'start' \| 'center' \| 'between'` | `'center'` |
| `dismissible` | `boolean` | `false` |

### Slots

| Slot | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `default` | Main content |
| `icon` | Left icon |
| `action` | Right action area |

### Events

| Event | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `dismiss` | Emitted when the banner is dismissed |

### Examples

```vue
<Banner variant="info" dismissible>New version available.</Banner>

<Banner variant="success">
  <template #icon>ðŸŽ‰</template>
  Account verified!
  <template #action>
    <Button variant="ghost" size="sm" class="text-white">Details</Button>
  </template>
</Banner>

<Banner variant="warning" position="sticky">
  Scheduled maintenance at 2:00 AM.
</Banner>
```

---

# CHART REFERENCE (`@3df-spa/charts`)

## Setup

```ts
import { UiChartBar, UiChartLine, UiChartPie, UiChartRadar, UiChartScatter, UiChartGauge, UiChartTooltip, UiChartLegend } from '@3df-spa/charts';
import type { ChartConfig, ChartDataRow } from '@3df-spa/charts';
```

## Shared Types

```ts
type ChartConfig = Record<string, { label: string; color: string }>;
type ChartDataRow = Record<string, string | number>;
```

---

## Bar Chart

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `config` | `ChartConfig` | *required* |
| `data` | `ChartDataRow[]` | *required* |
| `index` | `string` | *required* |
| `orientation` | `'vertical' \| 'horizontal'` | `'vertical'` |
| `mode` | `'grouped' \| 'stacked'` | `'grouped'` |
| `showTooltip` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `showLegend` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `showGrid` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `showXAxis` / `showYAxis` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `tickCount` | `number` | `5` |
| `radius` | `number` | `6` |
| `barGap` | `number` | `0.15` |
| `categoryGap` | `number` | `0.25` |
| `minHeight` | `number` | `350` |
| `animate` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `valueFormatter` | `(v: number) => string` | â€” |
| `tooltipFormatter` | `(v: number, key: string) => string` | â€” |

### Example

```vue
<script setup lang="ts">
import { UiChartBar } from '@3df-spa/charts';
import type { ChartConfig, ChartDataRow } from '@3df-spa/charts';

const data: ChartDataRow[] = [
  { month: 'Jan', revenue: 4000, expenses: 2400 },
  { month: 'Feb', revenue: 3000, expenses: 1398 },
  { month: 'Mar', revenue: 5000, expenses: 3200 },
];

const config: ChartConfig = {
  revenue: { label: 'Revenue', color: '#3b82f6' },
  expenses: { label: 'Expenses', color: '#ef4444' },
};
</script>

<template>
  <UiChartBar :data="data" :config="config" index="month" />
  <UiChartBar :data="data" :config="config" index="month" mode="stacked" />
  <UiChartBar :data="data" :config="config" index="month" orientation="horizontal" />
</template>
```

---

## Line Chart

### Additional Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `curveType` | `'monotone' \| 'linear' \| 'step'` | `'monotone'` |
| `mode` | `'none' \| 'stacked' \| 'expanded'` | `'none'` |
| `showDots` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `showArea` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `showLine` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `fillOpacity` | `number` | `0.25` |
| `strokeWidth` | `number` | `2.5` |
| `dotRadius` | `number` | `4` |

### Example

```vue
<UiChartLine
  :data="data"
  :config="config"
  index="month"
  curve-type="monotone"
  :show-area="true"
  :show-dots="true"
/>
```

---

## Pie Chart

### Additional Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `valueKey` | `string` | â€” |
| `innerRadius` | `number` | `0` (0 = pie, >0 = donut) |
| `radiusFraction` | `number` | `0.85` |
| `padAngle` | `number` | `1.5` |
| `cornerRadius` | `number` | `3` |
| `showLabels` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `labelType` | `'percent' \| 'value' \| 'name'` | `'percent'` |
| `startAngle` | `number` | `-90` |

### Example

```vue
<!-- Simple pie: each key in config is a slice -->
<UiChartPie
  :data="[{ os: 'Desktop', users: 400, mobile: 300, tablet: 100 }]"
  :config="{
    users: { label: 'Desktop', color: '#3b82f6' },
    mobile: { label: 'Mobile', color: '#10b981' },
    tablet: { label: 'Tablet', color: '#f59e0b' },
  }"
  index="os"
/>

<!-- Donut -->
<UiChartPie :data="data" :config="config" index="os" :inner-radius="60" />
```

---

## Radar Chart

### Additional Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `variant` | `'polygon' \| 'circle'` | `'polygon'` |
| `levels` | `number` | `5` |
| `showFill` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `fillOpacity` | `number` | `0.2` |
| `showDots` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `showAxisLabels` | `boolean` | `true` |

### Example

```vue
<UiChartRadar
  :data="[
    { skill: 'Vue', alice: 90, bob: 70 },
    { skill: 'TypeScript', alice: 85, bob: 90 },
    { skill: 'CSS', alice: 70, bob: 60 },
    { skill: 'Testing', alice: 60, bob: 80 },
    { skill: 'DevOps', alice: 50, bob: 75 },
  ]"
  :config="{
    alice: { label: 'Alice', color: '#3b82f6' },
    bob: { label: 'Bob', color: '#ef4444' },
  }"
  index="skill"
  variant="polygon"
/>
```

---

## Scatter Chart

Uses `ScatterConfig` instead of `ChartConfig`. Each series specifies its own `xKey` and `yKey`.

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `config` | `ScatterConfig` | *required* |
| `data` | `Record<string, string \| number>[]` | *required* |
| `dotRadius` | `number` | `6` |
| `minDotRadius` / `maxDotRadius` | `number` | `4` / `24` |

```ts
// ScatterConfig
type ScatterConfig = Record<string, {
  label: string;
  color: string;
  xKey: string;
  yKey: string;
  sizeKey?: string;
  shape?: 'circle' | 'square' | 'diamond';
}>;
```

### Example

```vue
<UiChartScatter
  :data="[
    { height: 170, weight: 70, bmi: 24 },
    { height: 180, weight: 85, bmi: 26 },
    { height: 160, weight: 55, bmi: 21 },
  ]"
  :config="{
    series1: {
      label: 'People',
      color: '#3b82f6',
      xKey: 'height',
      yKey: 'weight',
      sizeKey: 'bmi',
      shape: 'circle',
    },
  }"
/>
```

---

## Gauge Chart

Standalone â€” no `config`, no `data` array. Just a single `value`.

### Props

| Prop | Type | Default |
|------|------|---------|
| `value` | `number` | *required* |
| `min` | `number` | `0` |
| `max` | `number` | `100` |
| `variant` | `'semicircle' \| 'arc' \| 'full'` | `'semicircle'` |
| `segments` | `GaugeSegment[]` | â€” |
| `color` | `string` | `'var(--color-chart-1)'` |
| `trackColor` | `string` | `'var(--color-border)'` |
| `label` | `string` | â€” |
| `strokeWidth` | `number` | `20` |
| `showNeedle` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `showSegmentLabels` | `boolean` | `false` |
| `valueFormatter` | `(v: number) => string` | â€” |

```ts
// GaugeSegment = { label?: string; max: number; color: string }
```

### Examples

```vue
<!-- Simple gauge -->
<UiChartGauge :value="72" label="CPU Usage" />

<!-- With segments -->
<UiChartGauge
  :value="65"
  :min="0"
  :max="100"
  variant="arc"
  label="Performance"
  :segments="[
    { max: 30, color: '#ef4444', label: 'Low' },
    { max: 70, color: '#f59e0b', label: 'Med' },
    { max: 100, color: '#10b981', label: 'High' },
  ]"
  :show-segment-labels="true"
  :value-formatter="(v) => `${v}%`"
/>

<!-- Full circle -->
<UiChartGauge :value="42" variant="full" :show-needle="false" />
```

---

## Class Override Pattern

All components support Tailwind class overrides via the `class` attribute:

```vue
<Button class="w-full rounded-full">Full width pill</Button>
<Badge class="rounded-full">Pill badge</Badge>
<Card class="bg-muted">Gray card</Card>
<UiChartBar class="rounded-xl border" :data="..." :config="..." index="..." />
```

Classes are merged via `cn()` (clsx + tailwind-merge), so your classes will properly override defaults without needing `!important`.

---

## Design Tokens

Available Tailwind token classes from the theme:

**Colors:** `background`, `foreground`, `card`, `card-foreground`, `popover`, `popover-foreground`, `primary`, `primary-foreground`, `secondary`, `secondary-foreground`, `muted`, `muted-foreground`, `accent`, `accent-foreground`, `destructive`, `destructive-foreground`, `border`, `input`, `ring`

**Usage:** `bg-primary`, `text-muted-foreground`, `bg-card`, `shadow-sm`, etc.

**Radius:** `rounded-sm` (0.45rem), `rounded-md` (0.65rem), `rounded-lg` (0.75rem), `rounded-xl` (1rem)

**Key dark mode values:**
| Token | Light | Dark |
|-------|-------|------|
| `background` | `hsl(0 0% 98%)` | `hsl(0 0% 0%)` |
| `card` | `hsl(0 0% 100%)` | `hsl(0 0% 5%)` |
| `popover` | `hsl(0 0% 100%)` | `hsl(0 0% 5%)` |
| `muted` | `hsl(0 0% 96%)` | `hsl(0 0% 10%)` |

**Note:** Form controls (Input, Textarea, Select) use `bg-foreground/5` instead of a dedicated background token â€” this adapts automatically to light/dark mode. The `border` and `input` tokens are still available for directional borders (e.g., `border-b border-border` on table rows) but are NOT used on component edges.
